#summary Configuration For Developer
#labels Featured,Phase-Implementation

=Prerequisities=

For developing you need the following tools installed before:

* IDE: [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/ Eclipse Ganymede 3.4.2]

* Automation: [http://ant.apache.org/bindownload.cgi Apache Ant 1.7.1]

* Versioning: [http://subclipse.tigris.org/update_1.6.x SVNKit 1.6 for Eclipse]

* Code Coverage: [http://update.eclemma.org Emma for Eclipse]

=Check Out=

  # Check out the project from Subversion Repository: https://anttaskskype.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/

=Eclipse Configuration=

 # Define a variable "ANT_HOME" with "d:\\Programmi\\apache-ant-1.7.1" (or your different path).
